title: Shaza leaves for China to attend Digital Economy Conference 2024
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 30 (APP): Minister of State for IT and Telecommunication Shaza Fatima Khawaja has left for China on Sunday on an official visit to represent Pakistan at Global Digital Economy Conference (GDEC) 2024 being held in Beijing from July 2-5.
Minister of State for IT will visit booths of Pakistani tech companies and meet their representatives said a news release.
She will also attend “Euro Asia Pakistan Digital Economy Forum”.
She will also participate in the panel discussions.
Minister of State for IT will hold meetings with President China Academy of Information and Communication Technology (CAICT), Global Vice President NXP Semiconductors, and Ali Baba Group.
The Global Digital Economy Conference 2024 to be held at China National Convention Center, Beijing, is aimed to expand global cooperation in the digital economy.
